welcome_message_body: Welcome to Salavan, Laos! Get ready to immerse yourself in the charm of this laid-back city, known for its lush countryside, rich cultural heritage, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Salavan has to offer.

restaurants.name: Khapiak Fish Saravan
restaurants.description: Khapiak Fish Saravan is a noodle restaurant located in Salavanh Province.

restaurants.name: ຮ້ານອາຫານ ວິໄລວອນ Vilayvone Restuarant
restaurants.description: ຮ້ານອາຫານ ວິໄລວອນ Vilayvone Restuarant is a asian restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Han Ping Mou Chunsy Luk2
restaurants.description: Han Ping Mou Chunsy Luk2 is a bbq joint located in the city.

restaurants.name: ສວນອາຫານ ຫນອງປາສ້າງແພດ
restaurants.description: ສວນອາຫານ ຫນອງປາສ້າງແພດ is a asian restaurant located in Salavan.

restaurants.name: ຮ້ານເຂົ້າອູມາມິ
restaurants.description: ຮ້ານເຂົ້າອູມາມິ is a food stand located in Salavan.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for VIP passengers and provides a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
